summaryText: Graduated in administration from USP, I have experience in software development using React, Angular and Spring Boot (JAVA) frameworks. In IT, I have worked on an internal marketplace development project and on a contract management system project. In these projects, in addition to development, I used agile methodologies to organize stories and sprints, and I was responsible for the documentation and creation of user manuals. Before switching to IT, I worked with human resources, with a focus on Training and Development (T&D). I have also worked in educational project management, KPI management, data analysis, and Instructional Design.

responsabilities: Backend software development using JAVA, Python, and the Spring Boot framework;
Frontend development with React / Typescript, and micro front-ends;
Frontend development with Angular / HTML5 / CSS3 / JavaScript;
Development of unit tests (JUnit / JEST / React Testing Library ) and integration tests (Postman / Playright);
Experience with microservices development, utilizing messaging communication (RabbitMQ);
Experience with relational databases (Oracle / MySQL / Postgres) and non-relational databases (MongoDB);
Preparation of technical estimates of the development effort;
Preparation of technical specifications;
UI design using Figma;
Assistance in requirement gathering and user story writing;
Experience with agile methodologies.
Management of the LXP (Learning Experience Platform);
Curating content, conducting learning needs assessment (LNA), training logistics, and implementing development initiatives;
Gathering, analyzing, and managing indicators.
Management of trainings within the LMS platform, innovating through the use of HTML to enhance course presentation;
End-to-end logistics and support for trainings within the virtual environment;
Continuous improvement of training processes through agile methodologies;
Relationship with internal clients to provide the best learning experience for participants.
Development of online and hybrid training journeys;
Management of the LearningHub LMS, based on Moodle;
Development of digital learning objects based on principles of andragogy and multimedia for education;
Creation of online games and exploration of innovation for digital learning.

experience3.period: jun/2019 - apr/2021 (from October 2019 as a full-time employee)
responsabilities: Planning and monitoring of projects throughout the customer journey with Crescimentum;
Development and control of schedules;
Support for ERP implementation, including gathering requirements and processes;
Coordination of the structuring of a global corporate training project;
Team management and allocation control in the project;
Analysis and generation of project indicators and human resources performance.

otherExperiences.title: Other experiences
list: Volunteering at Instituto Criar para Amar as an English/Portuguese translator - apr/2022 to present;
Work exchange at Chatteraise factory (Japan) - dec/2018 to mar/2019;
Volunteering at Projeto Kali, promoting education support events for high school students - aug/2016 to mar/2017;
General Coordinator at the Tutorial Education Program (FEA USP) - apr/2017 to sep/2019;
Events Coordinator at USP Júnior - feb/2017 to dec/2017;
Events Coordinator and Consultant at FEA júnior USP - apr/2016 to dec/2017.

academicBackGround.title: Academic Background
list: Postgraduate Specialization in People Management and Organizational Development - Mackenzie University - 2022 to 2023 (expected completion);
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration - University of São Paulo - 2017 to 2021;
College degree in Human Resources Management - Estácio de Sá University - 2020 to 2021.

list: FullStack Developer (Angular.js, Java, Spring Boot, JSP, MySQL) (400 hours) - Proway - 2022;
FullStack Developer (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, ReactJs, NodeJs, MySQL) (98 hours) - DIO - 2022;
